text: The 1880 Brown Bears football team represented Brown University in the 1880 college football season. The team lost its first game with Yale, the only match of the season.http://www.phys.utk.edu/sorensen/cfr/cfr/output/1880/CF_1880_Games.html ==References== Brown Category:Brown Bears football seasons Category:College football winless seasons Brown Bears football
title: 1880 Brown Bears football team
